<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
InvalidPostDecl occurs when there is a declaration in a for-loop post
statement.

Example:
 func f() {
 	for i := 0; i {{raw "<"}} 10; j := 0 {}
 }
```
